description.full: The Games on Demand version supports English. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". MLB 2K13 delivers hours of baseball action for any level of sports fan or gamer.  Master our signature right analog pitching controls to achieve perfection on the mound, enjoy the authentic baseball environment of MLB® Today featuring real life commentary and statistics, and develop winning players and teams in My Player, Franchise & Postseason modes.
description.short: MLB 2K13 delivers hours of baseball action for any level of sports fan or gamer.  Master our signature right analog pitching controls to achieve perfection on the mound, enjoy the authentic baseball environment of MLB® Today featuring real life commentary and statistics, and develop winning players and teams in My Player, Franchise & Postseason modes.
